alert.note: Alert for Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued October 21 at 3:17PM AKDT until October 22 at 12:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting to 55 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN...Until noon AKDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Periods of snow and blowing snow will cause whiteout conditions at times now through Sunday morning. West winds gusting to 55 mph will decrease to 25 mph by noon Sunday. Conditions will improve Sunday afternoon.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel extremely difficult. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
